name: Lemmings Paintball for Macintosh
overview: Lemmings Paintball is an action video game from the Lemmings franchise. Unlike most of the Lemmings games, it does not use a side-scrolling perspective but instead an isometric view of the levels. The gameplay is also very different from other Lemmings games, focusing on splattering enemies with paint from a gun. The levels contain various puzzles including moving platforms, lemming catapults, and trampolines.
